segments.text: I'm quite upset ! I want a new room and a refund for tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Forgive me , sir , I haven't been told what the problem is .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm about to be swept away by millions of cockroaches !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My apologies , sir . We'll transfer you to a new room at once and give you a full refund .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . I didn't want to have to take this to court .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sir , we never want a guest to stay here mad or unhappy .
segments.speaker: S2
